name: Be Near My Little Ones
description:
be near

Be Near is an eerie stealth game where you and two others must restore three relics to three altars.  Sneak around the woods and find relics on the forest floor to bring back to each altar while avoiding anything which may be lurking there or you  can close your eyes and hope it goes away.
Once all three relics are restored, return to the central shrine to be at peace. 

Made for LudumDare 43 Jam

 - PC Controls-

Move - WASD
Look - Mouse
Sneak - Space (hold)
Sprint - Left Shift (hold)
Pick up / drop items - F
Drop pebble - E
Throw pebble - Left click (hold and release)
Close your eyes in fear - Q (hold)
Pause - Escape
